title: Node is trying to revalidate peers infinitely
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description When the node try once to revalidate a peer and failed, it will retry forever, which will result with a huge stack of peers that will try to be revalited ### Has this worked before in a previous version? I noticed this behavior to be included since the genesis of Onyx testnet ## üî• Error

c:/prysm/prysm.bat beacon-chain --datadir=c:/prysm --dev
Running alpha 12

To give some more context, here is the stack of peer that cannot be validated, you will find the exact same peers than in the previous comment (2 days ago) + some more
